text:
Blablacar (blablacar.com) | Paris, France | Onsite | Full-Time | Visa

BlaBlaCar is the global leader in long-distance carpooling.

My team is hiring software engineers to take over the short distance car-pooling market via the Blablalines app.

* Software Engineer: https://www.smartrecruiters.com/BlaBlaCar/743999665160242-so...

* iOS developers https://jobs.smartrecruiters.com/BlaBlaCar/743999665157469-i...

There are various positions open in the rest of the organisation as well: https://careers.smartrecruiters.com/BlaBlaCar.
